official_title: Assistant Professor of Finance, NYU Shanghai; Global Network Assistant Professor, NYU
bio:
Yiqing Lu is an Assistant Professor of Finance, NYU Shanghai; Global Network Assistant Professor, NYU. She holds a PhD from London School of Economics and Political Science and a B.S. from Shanghai Jiao Tong University.
Professor Lu’s research interests are theoretical and empirical Corporate Finance, Corporate Governance, and Contract Theory.

Courses Taught

Foundations of Finance

Education

  • PhD, Finance, London School of Economics and Political Science, 2016
  • M.S., Finance and Economics, London School of Economics and Political Science, 2010
  • B.S., Economics, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, 2009

Languages

English, Chinese, German (Basic)

 

Professor Lu is also a faculty member at Center for Business Education and Research. For more information about the center, please visit https://research.shanghai.nyu.edu/cber
